thread.title: Scott Eastwood flashes abs and muscular frame as legend Clint's son does beach workout
thread.title_full: Scott Eastwood flashes abs and muscular frame as legend Clint's son does beach workout

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Scott Eastwood flashes abs and muscular frame as legend Clint's son does beach workout
text:
Scott Eastwood flashes abs and muscular frame as legend Clint's son does beach workout The Suicide Squad actor puts his body on display as he splashes around in the sea Share Get celebs   
Scott Eastwood was a chip off the old block as he showed off his muscular frame in a pair of swimming shorts during a beach workout. 
The hunky Suicide Squad actor - whose father is the cinema great Clint Eastwood - has become a heartthrob in his own right, and he proved exactly why as he went for a dip in the sea this week. 
After pushing himself at an outdoor gym at Bondi Beach, he took himself for a swim. Scott Eastwood showed off his frame (Photo: MEGA) 
Pictures show the ripped star splashing around in the ocean as he cools down following the workout. Read More 
At one point, Scott's shorts even appeared to be falling down with the weight from the water, although they didn't reveal too much. The star is reaping the benefits of his workouts (Photo: MEGA) 
The star has been working hard on filming for Pacific Rim: Uprising, and shared updates with his fans on Instagram. Read More 
Alongside a photo of him between shots, he urged his followers to not "take no for an answer" and to chase their dreams. His dad is big screen icon Clint Eastwood (Photo: WireImage) https://www.instagram.com/p/BQbirxPBc8N/embed 
He added: "I Want to thank my mom for being the most amazing role model in my life. The kindest most selfless woman I know. 
"I also want to thank my dad. He hardend me up. made me go out and get a job at 16. Learn the value of a dollar. When I asked for something he said No. Told me if you want something, go out and earn it. Love you both (sic)" Like us on Facebook
